text.section: The governing body of a county or municipal corporation, by appropriate resolution or ordinance, may implement a local urban and community forestry program within its jurisdiction or enter into a cooperative agreement with the Department.

The Department may accept federal funds and provide funds, on a matching basis, to:
Cooperating counties and municipal corporations for the purpose of administering an urban and community forestry program; and
Nonprofit corporations that participate in the implementation and administration of an urban and community forestry program.

Any urban and community forestry program within the Department shall be:
Funded as provided in the budget; and
Consistent with § 5-307 of this title.
